website_summaries.verdict: With many features, Rockit has something for every baby. It dances, it teaches – even older kids are captivated with its recording and playback function.
pros: Rocking movement cues your baby to move along with the toy
Records and plays back your baby's speech in a funny voice
More than 100 songs, sounds, and phrases
Includes alphabet, numbers, shapes, and colors in English and Spanish
Roller ball, slide and ABC toggle switch on stomach
cons: Volume is a little quiet, even on loudest setting

customer_reviews.title: Since when is 3 songs equal to 100
customer_reviews.text: The motor that makes it dance is a little loud to me and there aren’t very many things to do (4 total, a ball that spins, a flip switch, a lever to push down and high five to make it record) I feel like there are better options out there for the 30$ price tag but we will see on Christmas if it’s a hit for our one year old or not.
customer_reviews.author: Am Fam

customer_reviews.title: There are hardly any songs.
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement says there are 100+ songs, but I've only heard about two (I've tried it on all of the levels). Also, the only colors it teaches them is red, blue and yellow. This toy is only worth about $20, not what they're selling it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and just the right size for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson for Christmas. It is adorable. A little low on the volume but is easy to operate. I know he w8ill love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of them for my grandchildren & they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Perri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toy I have ever seen. My 7 month old loves it. I love that it can record something you say and then it plays it back in a cute voice! I love that it moves so it's perfect for babies that are already sitting up. Will recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna Shatson

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough how much I love Amazon warehouse!!! As a single mom I need to pinch every penny but I love to spoil my kids. Their playroom looks like something out of a movie thanx to Amazon warehouse prices. This thing was 40 bux at another retailer yet I got a brand new, rather dusty, one. The package was perfect arrived with new batteries and perfectly functional. Its for 6+ month and even though the baby is one 3 months he was fully engaged with the bright lights sweet voice and moving parts. Good volum control for quiet babies that startle easily like mine. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: i dont like
customer_reviews.text: i think it was very cute so i got it for my baby and toddler but neither of them was interested. i think they will like it later. cleaning is easy. the reason i dont like it is the feature to repeat back even when not touching it would record and play back we think its a malfunction. i dont recommend it for that reason if that feature could be removed or turned off permantently that would be much better
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Babies Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these since Thanksgiving. One was for my great nephew who was three months old when he received his at Christmas. He loves it so much he has learned to turn it on himself. The other was given to a friend's baby who is eight months old and he loves it also. Both sets of parents have shared videos and still photos of the babies watching/playing with this toy. For me, it was money well spent to have given so much pleasure as well as learning experiences to these precious little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Mtn PeachTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Overall good toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old, and she loves it! It’s really easy for her to play with, and has different modes for her to grow with. I only have two cons for the product. The first is the play volume. There are two options. The low is a little too low, and the high is a little too high. The second con is the sound of the motor. When the toy talks, it’s toy half sways back and forth. It’s cute, and the baby loves it, but the hum of the motor is pretty loud. Aside from those two issues, it’s a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: KKandA

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t interest my son
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping my son would like this toy more than he did but it just didn’t interest him. He is 2 and just doesn’t play with it and wasn’t very interested in it dancing. Was hoping he would have like it more because it would have been a good educational toy. He mainly just ignored it and playedbstacjojg blocks. There was nothing wrong with they toy, it just didn’t interest him.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Fun for infant and toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Rockit for my then six-month-old son for Christmas. My almost three-year-old son likes playing with him too, especially the repeat feature. He likes to say silly things and have Rockit repeat them back to him. We also like the song that instructs us to dance when Rockit's face is green and freeze when it's red. My younger son likes to beat on Rockit and dance along with him. My only concern is that my younger son holds onto Rockit when he's moving (preventing him from moving) and I can hear a grinding noise. I worry the motor might wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for under 3 yrs old
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves her "Bebo" as we call it, not Rockit, so we gifted one to her younger cousin. Not one of their favorite toys, but it certainly entertains them when they do play with it. Durability is absolutely not an issue because she has picked it up and tossed it during a few tantrums - and it still works!
customer_reviews.author: AGonzales7

customer_reviews.title: This toy talks back
customer_reviews.text: for me, I like that it is durable and versatile, a good value. For the user, Louis the barbarian, He loves it and sits with it daily and is learning from it and how to use it. He carries it from place to place, dropping it, knocking it over and it just keeps on working as if it was new. It will be a toy that he will grow with for a year or so as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. donahue

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it! Bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves this toy! She loves it so much I bought a second one for the babysitters house. She can work it and doesn’t get frustrated with it like some plush toys that are a little to hard for her to push. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Spc40

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 month old son for Christmas. He's just getting into toys and bright colors and he's just become very active and playful recently so I bought this to hold his attention and I think he's going to love it! It's alot bigger than I thought it would be and it's pretty heavy to. Super colorful and bright. It teachers colors, numbers, friendship skills, etc. It lights up, dances, etc! Very nice looking gift. I'm super impressed and happy with my purchase! I got it when it was half off but it's worth the full price! Can't wait to give it to him in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's an okay product. I guess I expected more. Gets boring after a day or two. Also it randomly will start to record things and plays it back which is kind of scary. Very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Williams

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed, But Fun
customer_reviews.text: One star removed because of durability. Toy was scuffed on the back and front, just from the packaging it was sent in. Kids love it, though, and it is very amusing. Toy could have been packed nicer, and I'm sure with some rough and tough play, it'll pick up more scuffs easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herald

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 7 month old baby girl who loves this toy. She can self play and watch it dance or I can join in and record funny baby shark phrases to make her laugh when it replays it back in a high pitched voice! It also has different levels to change to as she gets older. I loved it so much, I bought one as a gift for a 1 year old boy. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MelRose86

customer_reviews.title: Creepy voice mimic
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute toy but I haven’t been very impressed by the functionality. My son gets bored with it quickly and this toy mimics what you say but in a weird way. We didn’t realize it had the mimic function and were taken off-guard because it’s actually kind of creepy, lol. I’d look for a toy with more playability, this is very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby wants to break it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute but my daughter keeps almost breaking it. She’s 9 months old and grabs for the things on top of the toy’s head, which then prevents the toy from moving. I can hear the gears trying to make it move and I’m pretty sure she’s about to break it. Probably better for older kids who aren’t still trying to eat everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pezzanite

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old LOVES this!!
customer_reviews.text: so fun! she will sit and record her voice and play it back over & over again. his little glowing friend he holds is too cute! this is a toy that will be played with for a very long time. im so happy with this purchase (:
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but can be a little boring. The repeat part is hard to hear even on high setting. Does help to keep my baby entertained though.
customer_reviews.author: DRaft

customer_reviews.title: 1 YEAR OLD LOVES THIS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas, she had just turned one. Because her birthday just passed I had no clue what to get her so I just picked this and had no clue what it was. Well my daughter LOVES this. Her and my son (3) love the recording/playback feature that we discovered on accident. Such a fun and interactive toy!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it but didn't work love the first time and second one didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite toy and we got it for get for Christmas and it stopped working early June so we bought a new one since she LOVES it and the new one didn't work when it arrived so we sent it back as defective for a refund. I'm hoping this was just a dud because our child loves this toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome interactive and absolutely adorable learning toy!
customer_reviews.text: We are really excited about this purchase! This little guy is so adorable we just can’t stop playing with him LOL. I got this for our three-month-old even though it’s a little bit young for him, I absolutely know he’ll know his ABC’s not long after he can speak because of this toy! This is so interactive and has so many different features based on the level you choose that this will bring quite a few years of enjoyment For my grandson! This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute! Bought for my grandson’s birthday next week! It came so quickly so I was so relieved to have it in plenty of time! I haven’t opened it up yet but it’s so cute and I know that he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Keller

customer_reviews.title: Fave toy of babies
customer_reviews.text: This is my grand kids fave you as babies . Its like having an on call best buddy! I bought two one for each of my kids kids and then had to get one for my house for them too!
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great toy that doesn’t annoy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 15 month old nephew and he LOVES it. I really liked that is had more than 3 sayings/ songs, has different “levels” for your child and their age, and I thought he would like the voice changing feature which he thinks is pretty funny.
customer_reviews.author: KT G

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I have not been that impressed with this item. Especially for the cost of this toy, I thought it would do more and entertain my child more than what it does. It is kind of boring and after about 5 mins she moves on to something else. My nephew is the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Granddaughter when she was 5 months old and she loved Rocket. Now she is 8 months and it is her favorite toy. It is made really wetland has plenty of lights and sounds to keep her interest.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandson (5months) loves it! Lights up, but not too bright for the room. Love the ability to control sound and the three different levels of play. Fun toy, keeps ones interest longer than a lot of other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Tampourlos

customer_reviews.title: For all ages
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 mo baby loves this! We bought this having seen a friends son enjoying this. Encourages her to do longer stretches of tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Praveen

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a little more from the song and dance. More selection and perhaps slightly longer as this to me is it’s main purpose. Microphone has too long of a recording period, and would probably have been better off done by holding in the arm for timing. My child likes the look of it and carries the toy around, enjoys the moving ears and lights as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old loves her rockit! He is actually a lot of fun, I set him on the floor with her and we use the talk function and the dance funtions a lot but they also have stages and teaches you some spanish which I think is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie S

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 months old and loves this. Once she's sitting up on her own i know she will be using it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Jenna K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but repetitive
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colorful and cute toy. The toy is a bit heavy so if it falls and hits your child then it can cause some damage. There are 4 modes but overall it gets repetitive. My baby plays with it for 10 minutes before getting bored.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to buy this since i first saw it. I got it for my 10 month old for Christmas and i really think he's gonna love it. It is cute and has so many different lights and movements. This is a must buy for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves it. It does a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I like the 3 levels of interaction. There are a lot of controls to twiddle. His sisters really enjoy the voice recording feature. I'm very happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome toy, my son played with ot all the time. The batteries never died in it either.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it, but has a major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The Fisher Price dance n groove rocket is a colorful and fun interactive toy. Unfortunately whenever our 11 month old daughter pushes or grabs the buttons that activate the sounds the toy falls over every time rendering it useless:(
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Sand

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 1yr olds first birthday. He absolutely loves it! It lights up with several different colors and if very educational as it also educates in Spanish. There are several different learning modes, which makes it great for kids of all ages. My kids specifically like how it listens to you and repeats it back in different voices.
customer_reviews.author: eric r swiney

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old was interested in it.
customer_reviews.text: First time my son saw this toy, he was 5mths old and my friend had bought it for her grand daughter he played with it in the back seat and til we dropped it off to the gtand daughter. He saw it again at the grand daughters house when we came to visit and played with it then. So i got it for him for xmas and he is now 6 months old with his very own and he is loving this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Venusluv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for learning experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and nephew and both were over a year old. Both spend hours playing with it. Not only is it a toy but always teaches them A lot of different things.
customer_reviews.author: Heather mclean

customer_reviews.title: Fun, engaging and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Interacts in a variety of ways. Can Record and repeat voice and sounds, be careful! haha! Our son loves to play with Rocket and has knocked or pulled it over multiple times but it continues to work and play without any problems. Excellent toy!
customer_reviews.author: jrcole

customer_reviews.title: Fun and bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 month old. It was on sale for a good price. She loves playing with it and dancing to the music. Great toy and the music is not bad either! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: Voice is very scary to a child
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter did not like this toy at all.When you push his hand down and you say something and he repeats it is terrible.The voice he repeats it in is very scary.My granddaughter cried,so this toy was a ways of money
customer_reviews.author: DMIST

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the fastest shipping ever. Ordered it Friday and got it Monday with free shipping! My son also loves this toy, right when I took it out of the box and turned it on he started grabbing for it and dancing along with it! Definitely worth the money and one of the best toys I've gotten him.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 1 year old and he loves it. Every time it plays music he gets up and dances. It’s too cute. His brother and sisters also enjoy playing with it. Especially the voice recorder.
customer_reviews.author: C.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love Rockit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. When he first played with it he was only three months old but was drawn to all the lights and sounds. This will be a fun and educational toy for him as he gets older!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Blizzard

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew and he loves it. It dances and sings. I would def repurchase again (as a gift of course).
customer_reviews.author: Khknott87

customer_reviews.title: Fun and friendly.
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy. My son (7 months) loves to hear the sounds and see the lights. My older children think it’s fun to record their voices for playback. A wonderful toy that I plan to gift to a friends son who will be 1.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not that cool...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting much more out of this toy. My daughter doesn’t play with it because it doesn’t do much. My 5 year old likes the recording aspect of it and uses it more than her little sister.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: 1yr old favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew's first birthday and it was a hit! He loves all the music and dancing! It has many different modes that will continue to teach new things for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Clift

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Toy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I bought this for my grand daughter . She adores the interaction . Lively but not over whelming to a small child . Would recommend this for any child , great price and availability .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vinciguerra

customer_reviews.title: Very educational and fun at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson 2 yrs. loved this toy. The music educational, fun . I recommend this toy. Your child will play with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price Dance and Groove.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my one year old grand baby and he loves it, it brings a smile to his face each time it moves. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mtdoramike

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for babies/toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for 1 year old niece! She loves it and crawls straight to this toy. Fun music and activity for little ones. Would recommend for those who have little ones around the age of 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Has great songs, if you push de microphone hand it will record when face is red and then it will repeat what was recorded. Great toy, gave as a gift for Christmas for my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Pepa

customer_reviews.title: Worked less then 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Really did like this toy but after less then 2 months it started to malfunction and now it does not work anymore. In less then 2 months? And it’s not that cheap of a toy. The seller won’t even exchange it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the understanding that The packaging would be slightly broken down or not in its original packaging. But when we opened it we noticed that somebody tried to clean it with a solvent which messed up it’s Eye. For a $4.00 discount I would have purchased it brand new. It is very quiet. Hard to hear...
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece and although it is a great gift, for a toy it is rather expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a present for our Granddaughter. It is so bright and colorful and she loves that it is plays music. It will also grow with her as it has several levels.
customer_reviews.author: Short Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and engaging.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now purchased 3 of these as gifts. Babies LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun baby toy!! Our 7 month old loves this toy! Our older boys enjoy playing with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy ! Very colorful, interactive- it’s my 7 month old grandsons favorite toy. Encourages child’s interaction, several stages as child progresses.
customer_reviews.author: csschmitz

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift I just wish there were more sayings. My daughter loves the lights
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Cute, wish it had more features though.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute toy. Although for the price I would've expected it to do even more than it does. It has different settings but 2 of 3 are very "short" interactions.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 month old nephew and he loves it, it has him playing with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Movement is too loud
customer_reviews.text: Too loud. My baby does not enjoy the music because the gears can be heard over it
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Jaqueline Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old loves this! I only wish there was a volume control on it. But overall it is a great toy for little ones to interact with!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute Christmas gift. 1 year old daughter is not quite interested in it yet. She likes dancing to it a little. I can see it will be better when she’s a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He ecspecially loves how it can repeat what we say! Fun, interactive toy & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Goodnow

customer_reviews.title: Happy granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this item in any local store was hesitant on it getting to me in time I am so glad l went for it fast shipping got in time great item very happy customer thanks
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Amick

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids over 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My little one likes this but she keeps knocking it over and I'm so afraid shes gonna pinch her fingers (she hasnt)
customer_reviews.author: MannyandJess09

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it so much and it stands up very well to the roughness of a 3 year old and 18 month old
customer_reviews.author: sienna holden

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: it's very practical and exciting for kids, also has a mic to repeat your voice in a funny way. My baby has 11 months and plays with this toy everyday. 100% recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great Sitting Baby Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for a sitting baby. It’s cute and my daughter loves it! Plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Frances

customer_reviews.title: Total waste
customer_reviews.text: Bought back in October as a Christmas gift. My special needs son watched it and could only touch it, so no rough play. Product lasted 10 days. Replaced new batteries and still doesn’t work. Return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to entertain 6 month old
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the lights and sounds. He smiles so big and hasn't lost interest and it's been 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: allyquinn

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I thought my son would love this toy, he loves music. And he just doesn't have any interest in it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is only 4 months old but she loves colors! This is an adorable toy, even used for tummy time to get her to crawl.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyC

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 Month old got this today for Christmas we bought it a month ago and couldn't wait for him to get it! It's wonderful it came packaged nice and worked well! It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great educational toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy it lights up, plays music, records sounds, dances, sings, numbers, alphabets shapes and colors great educational gift
customer_reviews.author: Justin Payton

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected but looks strongly made!
customer_reviews.text: This toy will keep my baby busy moving and having fun! Can't wait to see her open it after Christmas cause her first birthday is two days after!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Michelle Luck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this toy! I would most definitely recommend it. It has so many different features, she doesn't get too bored with it. And that says a lot, being that she's 15 months old!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my granddaughter! She loves it! High quality, easy to use, durable, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 month old grandson and he loves it. Although, he is always trying to turn it upside down to get to the voice. But it is a great educational toy.
customer_reviews.author: Pencita

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old son LOVES this toy!!! It is so adorable! It also has so many songs & different features. Totally worth the money. Best baby toy on the market.

customer_reviews.title: Kid's favorite
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I got it for my 9 month old but my 3 year old loves it just as much! Great little toy.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The baby absolutely is obsessed with this! He loves all the lights and sounds and all the things this does.

customer_reviews.title: It’s educational and fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just loves it he learns how to press all the buttons and dances with it.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute grandkids love them. My only thing is the sound is very low wish it had a volume control.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and my son absolutely loves it. Since it has different settings he can use it for a long long time.

customer_reviews.title: So fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby loves this. The music and talking amazes her.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Masters

customer_reviews.title: The kid enjoyed,its a gift  and the price was right.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift but I let my six month old play with it a bit and he loves it. I also got it at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cutest toy ever.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my bff who's child has cerebral palsy. It is a great sensory toy. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy. Bought this for my son for Christmas and still working great
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Helps baby learn how to roll and hit buttons
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had gotten one as a gift it was a hand me down, it broke so I ordered her a new one. It’s her fav toy! It’s easy for babies to learn how to roll and push buttons! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jewlessa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for grand daughter, surprised how quickly she managed to operate. (Just 6 mos old)

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy! Perfect gift for my one year old. She's rough with toys and this one is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Dance & Groove Rockit, Interactive Musical Infant Toy [Amazon Exclusive], Multicolor (FNV41)
product_meta.description: Style:Dance & Groove RockitInteractive learning buddies Dance & Groove Rockit and Glow can't wait to play and learn with your baby! The adorable duo interacts with each other and your little one, offering interactive lights, music, and phrases that teach the alphabet, counting, and more. Your baby will love exploring all the hands-on play and watching these two pals interact with each other (and your kiddo!) with bright lights and cool motions. High-five! Rockit can even record what you say and repeat it back with three silly voices! Plus, with Smart Stages technology, the learning content changes as your little one grows! Where development comes into play Academics: Rockin' tunes and phrases teach the alphabet, colors, counting, shapes, Spanish, and more! Sensory: Get your baby's senses dancing with bright, colorful lights, exciting music and motion, and different textures. Curiosity & Wonder: Your toddler is introduced to cause and effect as they discover how to get Rockit and Glow moving with fun lights and sounds.
feature_bullets: Rockit and Glow interact with each other (and your kiddo) at every activation! For kids ages 6-36 months.
Fun rocking motion encourages baby to move and groove along to the music!
Push down on Glow for exciting songs, music, and colorful lights
A belly-full of hands-on fun: 1-2-3 bat-at roller, slide the shapes door, or flip the ABC toggle switch
Give him a high-five then say something to hear Rockit repeat it with one of three silly voices!
Rockit has a light-up face and textured hair and feet for baby to explore.
